content.title: RioVizual 3.1.0 Released
content.content:
We’ve been listening to your feedback! This update focuses on giving you more granular control over your animations while keeping your site speed lightning-fast.

New
  • Improved editor performance for faster block rendering
  • Fixed issues with table column alignment in some cases
  • Added support for custom cell formatting options
Added
  • ✨ Improved editor performance for faster block rendering
  • Fixed issues with table column alignment in some cases
View More

content.title: New Feature: Advanced Filtering
content.content:
RioVizual 3.1.0 is here! Introducing the brand-new DataTable block — built to display structured data with speed, flexibility, and full editor control.Improve
  • Improved editor performance for faster block rendering
  • Fixed issues with table column alignment in some cases
  • Added support for custom cell formatting options

content.title: Mobile Responsive Improvements
content.content: Our DataTable block now adapts perfectly to mobile screens, ensuring a seamless experience on any device.

content.title: Custom Styling Options
content.content: You can now fully customize the look of your DataTable block with new styling options, including colors, fonts, and layout adjustments.
